replies.body:
Its been a pleasure my old friend....
I would have loved if you had a bit more motivation on applying again.
And if you are just plain bored, I bid you farewell.

I will however talk to you on skype and update you on different places you can try out for build-wise. I know you will go far!
Ciao..

replies.body: See ya AwarriorVenom :(
replies.body_tagged: See ya AwarriorVenom :(

replies.body:
I tried to keep myself from responding to the comments but I cant...


So, do not worry, I am not done with Minecraft yet... I look forward to joining epic building teams and building many more maps... <3 Its most certainly the last thing keeping me on this game, I did and mastered everything there is to.. Almost

I will still be on my Skype and I will hopefully post my future mega builds on my Pmc account, Follow me if you care about me or want to see what ill build in the future http://www.planetminecraft.com/member/archeonixx/

It has been a pleasure Avicus. But who knows, I might change my decision someday..


And Yoav I dont know how I couldved made my mod application any better honestly :( -And even if I actually passed the interview and got accepted, I dont want to have to go through 4 months of Jr moderating again..
replies.body_tagged:
I tried to keep myself from responding to the comments but I cant...


So, do not worry, I am not done with Minecraft yet... I look forward to joining epic building teams and building many more maps... <3 Its most certainly the last thing keeping me on this game, I did and mastered everything there is to.. Almost

I will still be on my Skype and I will hopefully post my future mega builds on my Pmc account, Follow me if you care about me or want to see what ill build in the future http://www.planetminecraft.com/member/archeonixx/

It has been a pleasure Avicus. But who knows, I might change my decision someday..


And Yoav I dont know how I couldved made my mod application any better honestly :( -And even if I actually passed the interview and got accepted, I dont want to have to go through 4 months of Jr moderating again..

replies.body:
AwarriorVenom, I can't believe the time has come to this.. For me to say bye to one o my best friends on avicus. You've been really kind and very nice to me, and I'll miss those times very much <3. We always used to play elimination and games and twas fun. I wish you good luck my friend and wish you the best in your future build teams and many more. 
- From: Sliccy
- To: AwarriorVenom the noodle <3

replies.body: Aww come onn dude, every time a veteran leaves a little piece of the server crumbles and drifts away, and as you have created so many great maps for the community a large chunk has gone. Well good look with your building and i really do hope you revoke your decision. Adios.
